messages.title: I LIVE IN CHESTER. I LOVE OUR CITY.
messages.content: AND TOGETHER WE’RE MAKING IT AN EVEN BETTER PLACE TO LIVE

messages.title: I’M UNLOCKING OUR CITY’S HISTORY BECAUSE I BELIEVE IN OUR CITY’S FUTURE
messages.content: When a local resident came to me with an idea to bring Chester Castle back into use, I jumped at it. I assembled the scheme which has seen the opening of the Castle Grounds – the castle itself will be open soon. It’s amazing what we can achieve when we all work together and I have a track record of delivery on important projects for Chester.

messages.title: I’M STANDING ALONGSIDE EVERY PARENT, TEACHER & PUPIL IN CHESTER
messages.content: I am leading the fight against cuts to Chester schools every day. Together with our schools I have used Parliament and worked hand in glove with local parents to stop these cuts where others were not able to. I have challenged Theresa May directly about Chester’s school funding and the additional pressure that local people have suffered. Theresa May threatened to take the rest of our schools budgets away - how will her candidate handle that?

messages.title: TOGETHER WE HAVE FOUGHT FRACKING IN OUR COMMUNITY
messages.content: Upton and Guilden Sutton residents have been independently surveyed about fracking in their communities and the answer was clear: 'We do not want fracking'. I have worked together with councillors and local campaign and community groups to draw that campaign to a halt in Chester. The Conservatives have voted for fracking elsewhere and their candidates back it. That is the national policy for local people.

messages.title: I SECURED SUPERFAST CABLE BROADBAND FOR 45,000 CHESTER HOMES
messages.content: When residents came to me for help with poor internet speeds I brought together local people and Virgin Media. I pressed Virgin Media to bring Project Lightning to our homes. We had tried harder and we now have one of the fastest broadband networks this constituency has ever experienced. 45,000 residents can benefit from fast broadband speeds thanks to Virgin Media and Labour getting on the job for our residents.

messages.title: I’M A VOICE FOR LOCAL BUSINESSES
messages.content: In the spring I began working with a group of small businesses to bring together a bid for a city centre improvement scheme. The bid would help Chester businesses grow and survive.
